TopicTitle: I can't focus any building after recovery on space center screen.

Articles.Content:
Hi i found a bug when you recovery something from KSC view all icons disappear and can't click on any building.
Bonus when you save game at this state and load it you get KSC underground but icons work.  It reset after visit building.
I don't test it wichout mods whis is why I post it here.

https://pasteboard.co/JPnz1ef.png

Might want to get rid of the old Modulemanager as well, one is enough.

Oh hey, I had this very bug the other day. Scared the heck out of me, as I was on my best sandbox, I thought it was a kraken or something like that.  Just close then open KSP. Also do what @Curveball Anders told you.

I think what can be bad then? I starts checking what is bad with my files, and after few atemps here you go:

I have steam version if this helps.

I don't know why I dont create backup earier... Try to install same files I has before but nyan still is there. I give up....

Nyan cat is a distraction in this case, it’s because today is Cat Day somewhere apparently. You probably just need to clear input locks, this can be done either by pressing escape > show version info (or alt+F12) > console > input locks > clear input locks) or by pressing the button that a mod (which mod, I can’t remember unfortunately, but it’s probably one @linuxgurugamer manages since he seems to own about half the KSP mods in existence ) adds to the toolbar. The terrain rising and engulfing buildings is a minor nuisance but as long as you can still use the buttons on the left to access the various buildings then you should be fine.

I can’t remember unfortunately, but it’s probably one @linuxgurugamer manages since he seems to own about half the KSP mods in existence ) adds to the toolbar.

The ClickThroughBlocker:

Ok I do completly nothing and nyan just disapears . Not for sure I think updating miniavc helps but must do more testing. I will continue topic if this bug reapears. For now thank you all for help with this problem.

9 hours ago, aezarkones said:

Ok I do completly nothing and nyan just disapears . Not for sure I think updating miniavc helps but must do more testing. I will continue topic if this bug reapears. For now thank you all for help with this problem.

Just to clear it up a little:

  • The nyan cat is a totally harmless joke / easter egg in Module Manager that causes the cat to show up on certain dates.
  • MiniAVC is severely broken since a couple of versions back but still included in some mods.
    And it's creator/maintainer is inactive so linuxgurugamer created ZeroMiniAVC to inactivate all calls to the broken code.

 

Edited February 23, 2021 by Curveball Anders

With this nyan i always think it shows up when i get some error in mod files this is cause i use miniAVC. I once use CKAN but i don't like it i like see what im installing check config read forum threads etc.  I hate bugs, kerbals have alot of them this is why i hate this game. But is about space <3 This is why i love it! Ty for your help and have nice day!

2 hours ago, Curveball Anders said:

And it's creator/maintainer is inactive so linuxgurugamer created ZeroMiniAVC to inactivate all calls to the broken code.

Actually, I am the current maintainer of MiniAVC, there is a v2 version which does work properly, only used in a few mods right now.

Problem was that it's included in so many mods and files.  It's impossible to fix/replace all mods/files, so I just declared it broken and am supporting (I didn't write it) the ZeroMiniAVC mod to make sure it gets removed.

2 hours ago, aezarkones said:

miniAVC

is game-breaking.  If you want that functionality, I suggest that first you install ZeroMiniAVC, and then install the full AVC mod, which works fine in the current releases
